size_and_fit.title: Size and Fit
size_and_fit.fit: Fits true to size, take your normal size
size_and_fit.model_size: Model is 180 cm / 70,8 inch and is wearing a size S and 'Tall' length

length.title: Length
length.select_height: In order to ensure that OK KINO clothes fit perfectly, we have provided an option to select your height
length.petit: If your height is up to 164 cm, then select 'Petite'
length.regular: If your height is between 165-175 cm, then select 'Regular'
length.tall: If your height is from 176 cm, then select 'Tall'

how_to_measure.title: How to measure:
how_to_measure.guide: To choose the correct size for you, measure your body as follows.
how_to_measure.hips: Hips — Measure 20cm down from the natural waistline

about.title: OK KINO IS A MOLDOVA-BASED WOMENSWEAR BRAND FOUNDED IN 2020.
about.text: Through collections OK KINO try to combine the authenticity of native country with the contemporary fashion. Clean silhouettes, precise tailoring and delicate color palette is the base of each collection. Immersing into traditional Moldovan details is another important part of the brand. Exploring the national heritage, creative directors Darya Golneva and Denis Caunov carefully work with ethnic and cultural symbols and codes, reinterpreting them from a new minimalism perspective. At OK KINO we care about ethical attitude towards environment and production. Therefore, we create high quality garments made to last, using carefully selected fabrics.

info.returnTitle: Return & exchange in 7 days, covered by client
